Reviews.Title: nice picture nice price
Reviews.Author: Jameel Hackett "neversurpassed"
Reviews.Content: Seller got it to me in two weeks across the country love the picture. Sound is ok but only has an optical output to go to a receiver. Changes inputs fast and has a fast warm up. It also needs good ventilation gets warm.

Reviews.Title: Obviously pleased
Reviews.Author: Huck
Reviews.Content: Largely pleased with this unit.  GREAT picture and super for the price.  Only drawback for me is that there is no closed caption function, which I do often need and there is only an optical output for sound which makes older sound enhancement devices unusable without some sort of optical to anologue converter.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p
Never miss a piece of the action.
ProductInfo.Name: LG 60" Plasma 180p 600Hz 2 HDMI Inputs
